sourcesContent:
import React, {useState} from 'react'; import '../css/reporttable.css'; import { createAPIEndpoint, ENDPOINTS } from '../api/index.js'; function StatsDaily() { const [data, setData]= useState([]); const blankFilters = { fullDate: "", min_fullDate: "", max_fullDate: "", year: "", month: "", day: "", dayname: "", open: "", holiday: "", rainy: "", entries: "", min_entries: "", max_entries: "", revenue: "", min_revenue: "", max_revenue: "", new_breakdowns: "", min_new_breakdowns: "", max_new_breakdowns: "", popular_ride: "" }; const [filters, setFilters] = useState(blankFilters); const updateFilters = (obj) => {setFilters({...filters,...obj});} const findday = () => { createAPIEndpoint(ENDPOINTS.report) .fetch() .then(response => { setData(response.data)}) .catch(error => console.log(error)) } const renderTable = () => { let info = data; if (filters.fullDate != "") { info = info.filter((item) => { return (item.attraction_id == filters.id); }); } if (filters.min_fullDate != "") { info = info.filter((item) => { return (item.name.toLowerCase().startsWith(filters.name.toLowerCase())); }); } if (filters.description != "") { info = info.filter((item) => { return (item.description.toLowerCase().includes(filters.description.toLowerCase())); }); } if (filters.min_height != "") { info = info.filter((item) => { return (item.min_height.toString().startsWith(filters.min_height)); }); } if (filters.breakdown_nums != "") { info = info.filter((item) => { return (item.breakdown_nums == parseInt(filters.breakdown_nums)); }); } return info.map(elem => { return ( {elem.dayname} {elem.open} {elem.holiday} {elem.rainy_date} {elem.entries} {elem.revenue} {elem.new_breakdowns} {elem.most_popular_ride} );} ) } return (

Daily Reports

*You can search by exact matches or by ranges. Only search by one or the other.

Full Date: Least Full Date: Greatest Full Date:
updateFilters({fullDate:e.target.value,min_fullDate:"",max_fullDate:"",year:"",month:"",day:""})}/> updateFilters({min_fullDate:e.target.value,fullDate:"",year:"",month:"",day:""})}/> updateFilters({max_fullDate:e.target.value,fullDate:"",year:"",month:"",day:""})}/>
Year: Month: Day:
updateFilters({year:e.target.value,fullDate:"",min_fullDate:"",max_fullDate:""})}/> updateFilters({month:e.target.value,fullDate:"",min_fullDate:"",max_fullDate:""})}/> updateFilters({day:e.target.value,fullDate:"",min_fullDate:"",max_fullDate:""})}/>
Open?: Rainout?: Holiday?:
Entries: Least Entries: Greatest Entries:
updateFilters({entries:e.target.value,min_entries:"",max_entries:""})}/> updateFilters({min_entries:e.target.value,entries:""})}/> updateFilters({max_entries:e.target.value,entries:""})}/>
Revenue: Least Revenue: Greatest Revenue:
updateFilters({revenue:e.target.value,min_revenue:"",max_revenue:""})}/> updateFilters({min_revenue:e.target.value,revenue:""})}/> updateFilters({max_revenue:e.target.value,revenue:""})}/>
New Breakdowns: Least New Breakdowns: Greatest New breakdowns:
updateFilters({new_breakdowns:e.target.value,min_new_breakdowns:"",max_new_breakdowns:""})}/> updateFilters({min_new_breakdowns:e.target.value,new_breakdowns:""})}/> updateFilters({max_new_breakdowns:e.target.value,new_breakdowns:""})}/>
Day Name: Most Popular Ride:
updateFilters({dayname:e.target.value})}/> updateFilters({popular_ride:e.target.value})}/>





{renderTable()}
Date Day Open Holiday Rainout Entries Revenue New Breakdowns Most Popular Ride
) } export default StatsDaily;
